name: UFO Airlines
description:
UFO Airlines is a simulation/strategy game that is inspired by games like "Mini Metro" and "Railroad Tycoon".

In this game you are the boss of the newly started company "UFO Airlines", and it's your job make it an success. 

Controls:

The game is controlled with the mouse and keyboard.

  • WASD or RMB+move mouse: Moves camera.
  • -/+: Zoom camera.
  • Point and click: Controls all interactions in the game.
  • Escape: Skip intro/Main menu.
  • 1,2,3 : Change game speed.

Early Access

This is a "Early Access"- game, so do expect some bugs, not super balanced gameplay, and the games text still needs some improvement. But the game is playable and there is an end goal.

Good luck and have fun
